revised_title: The Function and Importance of the Thyroid Gland
tldr: The author discusses the function of the thyroid gland and its importance in the animal economy. They describe the effects of removing the thyroid gland in animals, leading to symptoms similar to myxedema and cretinism. The study helps to understand the relationship between the thyroid gland and the central nervous system, as well as its role in various physiological processes.
